frameDefinitions: A Speaker conveys a Message to an Experiencer in order to reassure them about a Situation; Medium and the Means of the communication also may be expressed.
An Entity ends up with some Final_quality--a new fact about the Entity.
An Entity ends up with a particular new Final_quality.
An Entity ends up in a Final_category, Final_situation, or Final_quality which it was not in before.
A State_of_affairs turns out to be true in someone's knowledge of the world.
frameExamples: We <t>reassured</t> him that his decision was sound.
Hybrid grass may <t>prove</t> to be a valuable fuel source.
listRoleDefinitions: The sentient entity that uses language in the written or spoken modality to reassure another person.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> receives reassurance from the <fen>Speaker</fen>.
The <fen>Message</fen> is a proposition or set of propositions that the <fen>Speaker</fen> wants the <fen>Experiencer</fen> to believe in order to feel reassured.
The <fen>Situation</fen> is the problem plaguing the <fen>Experiencer</fen>, about which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  reassures them.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the reassurance takes place.
A force, process, or event that produces an effect.
Agents in a joint or reciprocal action (e.g. exchange)
A positive or negative evaluation of the Phenomenon.
An entity which participates in a <fen>Cause</fen>, perhaps volitionally and perhaps not.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The <fen>Entity</fen> which undergoes a change, newly ending up in the <fen>Final_category</fen> or taking on a new <fen>Final_quality</fen>.
A description of a characteristic of the <fen>Entity</fen> after the change.
The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> ends up in after the change.  Typically, this entails taking on a number of new characteristics.
>When the change occurs.
Where the change takes place.
The <fen>Entity</fen> which undergoes a change so that it possesses the <fen>Final_quality</fen>.
The quality that the <fen>Entity</fen> has at the end of the event.
When the change occurs.
Where the change takes place.
The <fen>Entity</fen> which undergoes a change, ending up in the <fen>Final_category</fen>, <fen>Final_situation</fen>, or <fen>Final_quality</fen>.
The quality of the <fen>Entity</fen> after the change.
The category that the <fen>Entity</fen> ends up in after the change.
The <fen>Entity</fen>'s situation after the change.
When the change occurs.
Where the change takes place.
The state of affairs that a cognizer realizes.
The time at which the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is realized.
listRoleExamples: <fex>He</fex> reassured her that she was his favorite ice-skating star.
He tried to reassure <fex>his potential customers</fex> that his company not only offered the best service, but also the most competitive prices.
How do you reassure them <fex>that you really like them</fex>?
The policeman reassured him <fex>about the safety of the neighborhood</fex>.
<fex>The wind</fex> made the door rattle.
<fex>That one stone</fex>, apparently, caused the avalanche that engulfed square miles of forest.
<fex>I</fex> grow impatient with your insolence.
Suddenly , she became <fex>impatient</fex> .
He never could understand how she ended up <fex>an evangelist</fex>.
<fex>By 1945</fex> he had become uncertain of the advisability of anyone having such a weapon.
He always became uncomforatable <fex>in bars</fex> .
<fex>I</fex> went limp .
Everything 's going <fex>wrong</fex>!
<fex>By 1945</fex> he had gone bad .
I went nuts in Berlin .
<fex>I</fex> grow impatient with your insolence.
Everything 's going <fex>wrong</fex>!
He never could understand how she ended up <fex>an evangelist</fex>.
My father got <fex>to where he did in the business</fex> through instinct and entrepreneurialism.
<fex>By 1945</fex> he had become uncertain of the advisability of anyone having such a weapon.
